name: Rely
description:
IMPORTANT:
If you're having trouble aiming and it feels off/skewed, please do play the hotfix version available right here, due to uploads being closed during the jam review period!

Meet our friends, Mr. Flower and Miss Flame! They both share a great friendship despite the (necessary) absence of physical contact! One day, Mr. Flower's so-called friends, the Water Meanies, turned against him for sharing a friendship with someone that was not like them (not constantly burning)! Naturally, Mr. Flower thought this was unacceptable! How can they judge someone that they never even met or talked to? Help our heroes stand for each other and show the Water Meanies how important it is to work together despite our differences!

Controls:

A, D - Move Left and Right
Left Mouse Button - Shoot Sparks (Miss Flame)
Right Mouse Button - Block Attacks (Mr. Flower)

Rely was done for the 2020 edition of the Extra Credits Game Jam (#ExtraJam2020) in 72 hours, under the theme Take Care. It is an arcade score-chasing Shooter in which you control two characters that must take care of each other in order to survive the incoming enemy waves. One of them can only shoot, while the other can only block incoming bullets, providing an asymmetrical control experience. Survive against the incoming waves of enemies and try to reach for an high score!

Besides being packed with hand-eye coordination testing, the game also currently features 6 different Water Meanies, including a Boss Meanie, ready to knock your socks off! (In case you get there, of course!)

All assets used for this game, except the font which is m3x6 by Daniel Linssen under Creative Commons, are original and were made during the 72 hours of the game jam. If you find a bug, want to give feedback, or just want to say hi, please do leave a comment! If you played and did really enjoy, consider following me here on Itch.io and/or on Twitter to keep an eye on my stuff!
